props.title: Run a Cardano Node
props.description: Set up and run a Cardano node on Raspberry Pi OS.
props.body:
## Introduction
***Are you a raspberry pi hobbyist or tinkerer? Do you want to know how to run a [Cardano node](/terms/cardano-node) on a raspberry pi?***

If you answered yes to any of the previous questions, check out our guide on getting a [passive Cardano node](/terms/passive-node) running on a raspberry pi 4. We go over the initial setup of the raspberry pi, how to boot from a USB storage device, and getting the Cardano node installed on the pi 4.
